content.text: I'm well, thank you! I am a bit bloated today, but I'm sure it will pass. I love to bake and travel. What are your passions?
Oh no! I hope you feel better soon! I love to sing and spend time with my kids. I also work as a bartender.
That sounds really fun! I love to sing too! I don't have kids, but I do have a small bakery.
Oh that's so cool! What kind of bakery do you run?
I make all kinds of desserts, but my specialty is cupcakes.
That sounds delicious! I love cupcakes!
Thanks! I'm glad you like them! What's your favorite kind of cupcake?
I love vanilla cupcakes with chocolate frosting.
